scripts.build:ui: @powershell if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; cd ..\full-stack-open\part2\phonebook; npm run build; Copy-Item dist -Recurse ..\..\..\full-stack-open-phonebook-backend\dist
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "uibuild exercice 3.11" && git push
